name: A way back home (Hanesto)
description:
Your goal is to get back home in this small platformer, made for Bauhaus University in roughly two months.

Please leave some feedback, if you played the game and liked it or if you didnt. We want to know either way. 

Please also remember that this is a student project developed in a very short amount of time so bugs or unfinished assets may appear. If you find anything, please tell us!

This game was made by:

  • Hannes Bethke
  • Felix Geith 
  • Ulrike Katzschmann
